Text: Stop re-ripping HD CHINA, please... their sound sucks hard and the movie is dark as hell!

Watchable and so far the best but for  a highly technical film the quality will be considered substandard as lots of dark images and distorted irritating high pitch sounds. AT best, V=8 A=7. You can play around  with your home theatre and Video machines to adjust images and sounds. Appreciate the effort vicerock.
